titles.title: Gold Star Parents Annuity Act of 2010

To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of a monthly stipend to the surviving parents (known as "Gold Star parents") of members of the Armed Forces who die during a period of war.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Gold Star Parents Annuity Act of 2010 - Directs the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to pay a special pension to each person who has received a Gold Star lapel button as a parent of a member of the Armed Forces who died while serving.
